name: Abandoned (itch) (Abandonment, Brendan_Geary)
description:
In this 2.5D Horror/Platformer/Adventure game, you do not know who you are and how you have arrived in this world of suffering. You have three options as you try to escape this world. Remain neutral and only search for the exit. Destroy all that stands in your way, as who should oppose you? Remain pure and help those who have lost their way. Will you be able to escape this world that has Abandoned you?

Controls:

W: Backwards

A: Left

S: Towards the Screen

D: Right

Spacebar: Jump

Mouse Left Click: Attack

I: Access or Close Inventory
